Go 176985602337900 Welcome to Elance! Get instant access to great talent. ™ Elance has over 1,300,000 rated&tested professionals to choose from.

Light Box Menu Design and Catering Order form Sign in to Add to Watch List N Design&Multimedia > Graphic Design
Posted: Tue, Feb 23, 2010 Time Left: Closed Location: Anywhere Start: Immediately
Budget: Less than $500 Fixed Price Job Guaranteed with Elance Escrow W9 Not Required Less Detail Sign in to view client's details Create a light box menu design for a fast food restaurant. Need to be based on the attached file. The designer need to choose the right images related to the menu attached from a library image bank which I will purchase once selected. Needs to incorporate the logo that it will be provided, please refer to the website [obscured] / for colour and logo images guideline. Visual area lightbox : 490mm (h) x 3313mm (w) (can be split in three section) Total area: 515mm (h) x 3330mm (w) Snap area is 6 mm. in each side
Second job is to create an A4 Catering order form based on the content in the menu in the light box
And the third job is to create an A1 outdoor signage with the same logo guideline and with a welcome sign and directing to the store.
All designs must deliver print ready files
Retail industry design experience is desired especially in retail food. Please provide samples of past design.
Please provide media assets within one week of selection....
Sign in or Register to see more
Desired Skills Digital Photography , Graphic Design , Illustrator , Photoshop Job ID: 19227550 Report Violation Proposals Total Proposals (2) | Proposals Declined (3) Avg $250 | High $250 | Low $250
